author: riga
body:
This PR contains the updates to bring tensorflow to version 2.1.0 which allows to pass custom thread pool options to `Session.run()` calls. This is required to finish https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28711.

I added the WIP label as the tensorflow source repository still needs to be updated in tensorflow-sources.spec (see inline comment). I prepared all changes in a personal  branch https://github.com/riga/tensorflow/tree/cms/v2.1.0, which needs to be ported to cms-externals.
title: [WIP] Update bazel to 0.29.1, tensorflow to 2.1.0.
